channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024...

item.title: 10-Year Treasury Yield Hits Highest Level Since November 2023
item.description: Ten-year Treasury yields rose to their highest level since November 2023, and Generali Investments said about one third of the the nearly 40bps rise s...

item.title: Europe's Gas Prices Rise Amid Lower Reserves
item.description: European natural-gas prices rose more than 4% after colder weather across the continent drove up demand, raising concerns over the state of reserves w...

item.title: Dollar, Treasury Yields Rise to 2-Year High After Strong Data Dims Rate-Cut Hopes
item.description: The dollar hit fresh highs against several currencies and U.S. 10-year borrowing costs increased in tandem, continuing their rise since strong jobs da...

item.title: S&P 500 Futures Fall, Bond Yields Gain
item.description: Stock futures fell, with the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 leading losses, while stock markets declined across Europe and Asia.

item.title: World's biggest chipmaker TSMC posts record 2024 revenue as AI boost continues
item.description: TSMC manufacturers semiconductors for some of the world's biggest companies from Apple to Nvidia.

item.title: Why Bond Yields Are Surging Around the World
item.description: The selloff in government debt is making it costlier to borrow, jarring stocks and pressuring indebted countries.

item.title: Walgreens shares soar 27% on big earnings beat, as drugstore chain cuts costs
item.description: Walgreens maintained its fiscal 2025 adjusted earnings guidance, but did not include a sales outlook in its release.

item.title: Corona brewer gets slammed post-earnings, and we question whether to keep the stock
item.description: This was not the quarter we were looking for â€” and unfortunately, we see little reason to defend Constellation brands.

item.title: Delta outlook tops estimates as CEO expects 2025 to be airline's 'best financial year in our history'
item.description: Delta's CEO said strong travel demand is driving revenue higher.
